main event: A UFO was sighted in Oro Grande, California on March 9, 1959, observed on radar and visually.
interesting points: The sighting involved 5 objects that descended rapidly and emitted white sparks., The object was tracked on radar for longer than it was visually observed., An Air Force Captain reported the sighting and conducted an investigation., The object appeared bell-shaped, with a dull white color and jagged edges., The sighting lasted approximately 5-10 minutes without any apparent sound.
witness description: housewife who observed the object from her bedroom window
